ohoma yaddi thama apita chandare set une.kapatikame upatha kiwwath waradi na.api minihata kiwwe dosthara kiyala.(nathi thanadi)miniha awurudu ganak otu dese indala awith thibune.kolloekka dumak danna,indala hitala gedarata kathakarala poddak setwemu kiyala kiyannath miniha amathaka kale na.habayi kade langa set eke thoragaththa hathara pas denekuta witharayi.mamath ee godata ayithi una.ithin ehema dawasata handawata api aaradhithayo set eka anith ewunta horen welasana kade langin maruwenawa.samaharadata athemattu.

36 melesa moses wisin rate oththu balimata yawanu laba, aapasu pamini charapurushayan rata gana boru aaranchi sala kala bawin mulu janathawa ma mosesta wiruddha wa masiwili ki ha. 37 thawada, mese rata gana boru aaranchi sala kala ee aya, samindanan wahanse wisin ewana lada wasangathayakin wanasi giyo ya. 38 eheth, rata gana oththu balu charapurushayan athara nunge puth joshuwa saha jepunnege puth kaleb pamanak nomari ithiri wu ha.
